results.title: Effects of simvastatin on walking performance and symptoms of intermittent claudication in hypercholesterolemic patients with peripheral vascular disease.
results.text_hl: Forty-three @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ were assigned to @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (40 mg/d); the remaining 43 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ were assigned to placebo treatment.

citations.NLM: Mondillo S, Ballo P, Barbati R, Guerrini F, Ammaturo T, Agricola E, Pastore M, Borrello F, Belcastro M, Picchi A, Nami R. Effects of simvastatin on walking performance and symptoms of intermittent claudication in hypercholesterolemic patients with peripheral vascular disease. Am J Med. 2003 Apr 1;114(5):359-64. PMID: 12714124
